name: Please don't explode !
description:
You play as a scientist who is trying to extract some files from an unstable artefact.. But everybody want to see what is this strange artefact and is trying to enter your laboratory to reach it ! Punch them out ! Or it may become unstable…

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/please-dont-explode


Made By : 
Romain de Leuze - GD
Romain Malka - GP
Thomas Kang - GP
Julien Barlet (Mouf)  - GD / GA

Tony Falbo  - Music

[After jam version changes]

- Sprint by default

- Sound effect for explosion

- Hp of the element increased
